About

Practical growth systems for local businesses.

Granite State Tech Services helps New Hampshire service businesses turn AI, SEO, and website traffic into booked calls. The focus is straightforward: fewer busywork hours, clearer funnels, and measurable revenue outcomes.

Book a consultation Read the playbooks

How I work

Built for operators, not theory.

Every engagement starts with one question: where is the current process leaking time, conversions, or search visibility? From there, we prioritize the fastest path to value.

  • 01 Find the highest ROI workflow or funnel gap.
  • 02 Build repeatable systems your team can actually run.
  • 03 Track outcomes and iterate quickly.

What clients usually need

  • + AI workshop rollout for real day-to-day tasks.
  • + Local SEO cleanup and service page strategy.
  • + Conversion-focused website refreshes.
  • + A clear 30/60/90 day execution plan.

Working promise

Clear decisions, no fluff.

You get specific recommendations, scoped options, and concrete next steps. If something does not move toward measurable impact, it does not make the plan.
